bibl.seg: MUNDELL MANGO Marlia (Ed.), Byzantine Trade, 4th-12th Centuries. The Archaeology of Local, Regional and International Exchange. Papers of the Thirty-eighth Spring Symposium of Byzantine Studies, St John's College, University of Oxford, March 2004. (Publications of the Society for the Promotion of Byzantine Studies. 14.)
Farnham - Burlington, VT, Ashgate, 2009, 8°, xxxii-477 pp., nombr. figg. ISBN 978-0-7546-6310-2. £63.
